# The `LoopNest` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This class represents a loop nest and can be used to query its properties. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>class llvm::LoopNest</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

This class represents a loop nest and can be used to query its properties.

  labels = {["inline"]}>
Return the innermost loop in the loop nest if the nest has only one innermost loop, and a nullptr otherwise.

Note: the innermost loop returned is not necessarily perfectly nested.

### getNestDepth() {#a2e412f8b916b22399f515ff64bfb6705}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="unsigned llvm::LoopNest::getNestDepth () const"
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Return the loop nest depth (i.e.

the loop depth of the &#39;deepest&#39; loop) For example given the loop nest: 
<ProgramListing>

<CodeLine><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(i)      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// loop at level 1 and Root of the nest</span></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(j1)   </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// loop at level 2</span></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(k)  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// loop at level 3</span></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(j2)   </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// loop at level 2</span></CodeLine>

</ProgramListing>
 <a href="#a2e412f8b916b22399f515ff64bfb6705">getNestDepth()</a> would return 3.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/loopnestanalysis-h/#l00155">155</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/loopnestanalysis-h">LoopNestAnalysis.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### getPerfectLoops() {#a57dd4a8d48a825207a80611dfef6d45e}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>SmallVector&lt; LoopVectorTy, 4 &gt; LoopNest::getPerfectLoops (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scalarevolution">ScalarEvolution</a> &amp; SE) const</>}>
Retrieve a vector of perfect loop nests contained in the current loop nest.

For example, given the following nest containing 4 loops, this member function would return &#123;&#123;L1,L2&#125;,&#123;L3,L4&#125;&#125;. 
<ProgramListing>

<CodeLine><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(i) </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// L1</span></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(j) </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// L2</span></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><span class="doxyHighlight">    &lt;code&gt;</span></CodeLine>

</ProgramListing>

## Public Static Functions

### arePerfectlyNested() {#a67c21f16b8b65879632a1d332e79d253}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool LoopNest::arePerfectlyNested (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> &amp; OuterLoop, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> &amp; InnerLoop, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scalarevolution">ScalarEvolution</a> &amp; SE)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
Return true if the given loops <code>OuterLoop</code> and <code>InnerLoop</code> are perfectly nested with respect to each other, and false otherwise.

Example: 
<ProgramListing>

<CodeLine><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(i)</span></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(j)</span></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(k)</span></CodeLine>

</ProgramListing>
 arePerfectlyNested(loop&#95;i, loop&#95;j, SE) would return true. arePerfectlyNested(loop&#95;j, loop&#95;k, SE) would return true. arePerfectlyNested(loop&#95;i, loop&#95;k, SE) would return false.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/loopnestanalysis-h/#l00051">51</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/loopnestanalysis-h">LoopNestAnalysis.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/loopnestanalysis-cpp/#l00103">103</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/loopnestanalysis-cpp">LoopNestAnalysis.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### getInterveningInstructions() {#a797a9f600b2119356e4ea74cdc6ba25a}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>LoopNest::InstrVectorTy LoopNest::getInterveningInstructions (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> &amp; OuterLoop, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> &amp; InnerLoop, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scalarevolution">ScalarEvolution</a> &amp; SE)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
Return a vector of instructions that prevent the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopnest">LoopNest</a> given by loops <code>OuterLoop</code> and <code>InnerLoop</code> from being perfect.

### getMaxPerfectDepth() {#ad2c7f512c7735232319f74e85a4263e2}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>unsigned LoopNest::getMaxPerfectDepth (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> &amp; Root, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scalarevolution">ScalarEvolution</a> &amp; SE)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
Return the maximum nesting depth of the loop nest rooted by loop <code>Root</code>.

For example given the loop nest: 
<ProgramListing>

<CodeLine><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(i)     </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// loop at level 1 and Root of the nest</span></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(j)   </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// loop at level 2</span></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><span class="doxyHighlight">    &lt;code&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(k) </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// loop at level 3</span></CodeLine>

</ProgramListing>
 getMaxPerfectDepth(Loop&#95;i) would return 2.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/loopnestanalysis-h/#l00069">69</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/loopnestanalysis-h">LoopNestAnalysis.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/loopnestanalysis-cpp/#l00261">261</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/loopnestanalysis-cpp">LoopNestAnalysis.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### skipEmptyBlockUntil() {#a0c3d91a5a6e71c114dea21819cc71382}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>const BasicBlock &amp; LoopNest::skipEmptyBlockUntil (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42; From, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42; End, bool CheckUniquePred=false)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
Recursivelly traverse all empty &#39;single successor&#39; basic blocks of <code>From</code> (if there are any).

When <code>CheckUniquePred</code> is set to true, check if each of the empty single successors has a unique predecessor. Return the last basic block found or <code>End</code> if it was reached during the search.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/loopnestanalysis-h/#l00075">75</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/loopnestanalysis-h">LoopNestAnalysis.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/loopnestanalysis-cpp/#l00288">288</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/loopnestanalysis-cpp">LoopNestAnalysis.cpp</a>.
